scripts.build: node -e "const{execSync:e}=require('child_process');const s=e('git rev-parse --short HEAD',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim();const m=e('git log -1 --format=%s',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim();require('fs').writeFileSync('build-info.json',JSON.stringify({sha:s,message:m,builtAt:new Date().toISOString()}))" && tsc -b
